thread.title: AstraZeneca, Cephalon to pay to resolve Medicaid allegations -U.S.
thread.title_full: AstraZeneca, Cephalon to pay to resolve Medicaid allegations -U.S. | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: AstraZeneca, Cephalon to pay to resolve Medicaid allegations -U.S.
text: WASHINGTON, July 6 AstraZeneca LP has agreed to pay $46.5 million and Cephalon Inc $7.5 million to resolve allegations that the two drug companies underpaid rebates owed under the Medicaid program, the U.S. Justice Department said on Monday. (Reporting by Eric Beech ; Editing by Bill Trott )
